0: When I arrived I was told the fitness room was under renovations so if we wanted to use a gym we had to go to the hotel across the street
Rooms could use some upgrading noticed upon check in some ripped chairs stained lamp shades not what you expect to see in a high end property
Only I hated was the pool being shut down for repairs
The only 2 minor items that made our stay less than perfect the hotels rooftop pool was closed for renovations during our visit
Only qualm was the carpet in our room was a little worse for wear but I believe they have renovations going on at the moment
As mentioned above the balconies were a little dirty from the renovations but not messy enough to detract from the beautiful city and bay views
The pool was closed for maintenance and we were very disappointed
Renovation work being carried out at hotel meant swimming pool is closed Monday thru Friday
Pool closed and I think the hotel needs a refurbishment
You could see the room needed an update and maintenance
1: Be sure to request one of the remodeled rooms they are gorgeous
I love their newly renovate rooms
Great location lovely pool and really beautifully refurbished rooms with great reviews
Hotel was modern and very nicely renovated
Spacious newly remodeled rooms with great views and proximity to some of the best restaurants in town
The hotel is a great value for what you are getting updated modern rooms complimentary happy hour 5 6 daily great location and good hospitality
Our room was beautiful large balcony newly renovated friendly and very clean decor
The rooms have all been recently remodeled and the rooms are very lovely
